name: Holly M Christenson
body:
# [About](/index) | [Research Interests](/research) | [CV](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4peXheOsBiNNUppWTlJWTI4Nm8/view?usp=sharing)

![hello!](/assets/hello.jpeg)


I am an undergraduate at Western Washington University. I expect to graduate in 2017 with a BS in physics and plan to pursue a PhD in astronomy or astrophysics after graduating. My research interests to date have included interstellar dust, Lyman Alpha emitters, and damped Lyman Alpha systems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
